titleStmt.title: The Constant maidens resolution, or, Silver and gold can't buy true love wherein is show'd an old mans fondness, the maidens constancy unto her dearest friend, being a rare pattern for all maids to take example by the same : to the tune of, Laugh and lye down.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: creased and torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
